name: Peanut Butter Hemp Cookies
author: Heather Hedstrom
summary: A very healthy peanut butter cookie full of protein. I have a very picky 3-year-old and was trying different ways to get some extra protein in his diet. He loves these cookies and they're extremely healthy.
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Mix flour, raisins, hemp seed hearts, baking powder, and baking soda together in a bowl
Beat brown sugar, white sugar, butter, and applesauce together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy; add peanut butter and beat until smooth
Beat eggs and vanilla extract together in a bowl; stir into peanut butter mixture
Mix flour mixture into peanut butter mixture until a smooth dough forms
Roll dough into small balls and place on a baking sheet; press each with a fork to flatten
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, about 9 minutes
